lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade is going home, making what he called "an extremely emotional and tough decision" on Wednesday night to leave the Miami Heat after 13 seasons and sign with the Chicago Bulls.

headline.print_headline: Coming Home: Dwyane Wade Leaving Heat for Bulls
headline.main: Coming Home: Dwyane Wade Leaving Heat for Bulls

snippet: Dwyane Wade is going home, making what he called "an extremely emotional and tough decision" on Wednesday night to leave the Miami Heat after 13 seasons and sign with the Chicago Bulls....
